00022 HistogramDisplay::HistogramDisplay() 
00023   : Gtk::VBox(false, 3),
00024     _status(),
00025     _showTotalHistogram("Show total histogram"),
00026     _firstIndexLabel("Major/Layer Index"),
00027     _rebinLabel("Combine bins"),
00028     _logY("Log Y")
00029 {   
00030  
00031   pack_start(_hbox,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5); 
00032   pack_start(_graphWindow,Gtk::PACK_EXPAND_WIDGET,5); 
00033   pack_start(_status,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5); 
00034 
00035   _graphWindow.add(_graphList);
00036   _graphWindow.set_policy(Gtk::POLICY_AUTOMATIC,Gtk::POLICY_AUTOMATIC);
00037 
00038   _histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->set_width_chars(40);
00039   _histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->set_width_chars(40);
00040 
00041   _hbox.pack_start(_histogramGroupSelector,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00042   _hbox.pack_start(_histogramCollectionSelector,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00043   _hbox.pack_start(_firstIndexLabel,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00044   _hbox.pack_start(_firstIndexSelector,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00045   _hbox.pack_start(_rebinLabel,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00046   _hbox.pack_start(_rebinSelector,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00047   _hbox.pack_start(_logY,Gtk::PACK_SHRINK,5);
00048 
00049   _firstIndexSelector.set_numeric(true);
00050   _firstIndexSelector.set_range(0,0);
00051   _firstIndexSelector.set_increments(1,5);
00052   _firstIndexSelector.set_sensitive(false);
00053 
00054   _rebinSelector.set_numeric(true);
00055   _rebinSelector.set_range(0,100);
00056   _rebinSelector.set_increments(1,5);
00057   _rebinSelector.set_sensitive(true);
00058 
00059   setGroupNames();
00060 
00061 
00062 #if (GTKMM_MAJOR_VERSION == 2 && GTKMM_MINOR_VERSION >= 4)
00063   //    _moduleSelector.signal_value_changed().connect(sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onModuleChanged));
00064   //    _oneModuleButton.signal_toggled().connect(sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onDisplayModeToggled));
00065 
00066     _histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->signal_changed()
00067       .connect( sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onHistogramGroupChanged) );
00068 
00069     _histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->signal_changed()
00070       .connect( sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onHistogramCollectionChanged) );
00071 
00072     _firstIndexSelector.signal_value_changed().connect( sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onFirstIndexChanged) );
00073 
00074     _rebinSelector.signal_value_changed().connect( sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onRebinChanged) );
00075 
00076     _logY.signal_toggled().connect( sigc::mem_fun(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onLogYChanged) );
00077 #else
00078     _histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->signal_changed()
00079       .connect( SigC::slot(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onHistogramGroupChanged) );
00080 
00081     _histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->signal_changed()
00082       .connect( SigC::slot(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onHistogramCollectionChanged) );
00083 
00084     _firstIndexSelector.signal_value_changed().connect( SigC::slot(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onFirstIndexChanged) );
00085 
00086     _rebinSelector.signal_value_changed().connect( SigC::slot(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onRebinChanged) );
00087 
00088     _logY.signal_toggled().connect( SigC::slot(*this, &HistogramDisplay::onLogYChanged) );
00089 #endif
00090 
00091   show_all();
00092   onHistogramGroupChanged();
00093 }

00095 void HistogramDisplay::setGroupNames()
00096 {
00097   HistMgrPtr histograms(HistMgr::getInstance());
00098   if (!histograms) return;
00099 
00100   if (histograms->getNGroups() != _histogramGroupSelector.get_popdown_strings().size()) {
00101     std::vector<std::string> group_names;
00102     histograms->fillGroupList(group_names);
00103 
00104     Glib::ustring current_selection=_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00105 
00106     // find out whether the group list has changed
00107     MD5 md5;
00108     bool selection_is_valid=false;
00109     for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator group_iter=group_names.begin();
00110          group_iter!=group_names.end(); 
00111          group_iter++) {
00112       md5.update(reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(group_iter->c_str()), group_iter->size() );
00113       if (!selection_is_valid && current_selection == Glib::ustring(*group_iter)) {
00114         selection_is_valid=true;
00115       }
00116     }
00117     md5.finalize();
00118     std::string hex_digest=md5.hex_digest();
00119     if (hex_digest!=_groupListMD5) {
00120 
00121 
00122       std::list<Glib::ustring> listStrings;
00123       for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator group_iter=group_names.begin();
00124            group_iter!=group_names.end(); 
00125            group_iter++) {
00126         listStrings.push_back(*group_iter);
00127       }
00128       
00129       _histogramGroupSelector.set_popdown_strings(listStrings);
00130       _histogramGroupSelector.set_value_in_list();
00131 
00132       _groupListMD5=hex_digest;
00133     }
00134 
00135     if (!selection_is_valid) {
00136       if (_histogramGroupSelector.get_popdown_strings().empty()) {
00137         _histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->set_text("");
00138       }
00139       else {
00140         _histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->set_text(*(_histogramGroupSelector.get_popdown_strings().begin()));
00141         // maybe the histogram group has changed.
00142         // setHistogramCollectionNames();
00143       }
00144     }
00145     else {
00146       setHistogramCollectionNames();
00147     }
00148   }
00149 }
00150 
00151 void HistogramDisplay::setHistogramCollectionNames()
00152 {
00153   Glib::ustring current_group_selection=_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00154 
00155   if (!current_group_selection.empty()) {
00156 
00157     std::pair<std::string,HistMgr::ECollectionType> group_name_and_type=HistMgr::getGroupNameAndCollectionType(current_group_selection);
00158     if (group_name_and_type.second >= HistMgr::kNTypes) return;
00159 
00160     HistMgrPtr histograms(HistMgr::getInstance());
00161     if (!histograms) return;
00162 
00163     std::vector<std::string> histogram_collection_names;
00164     histograms->fillHistogramCollectionList(Key_t(group_name_and_type.first), group_name_and_type.second, histogram_collection_names);
00165     
00166     Glib::ustring current_hist_collection_selection=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00167 
00168 
00169     if (histogram_collection_names.empty()) {
00170       if (_histogramCollectionSelector.is_sensitive()) {
00171         _histogramCollectionSelector.set_sensitive(false);
00172       }
00173     }
00174     else {
00175       if (!_histogramCollectionSelector.is_sensitive()) {
00176         _histogramCollectionSelector.set_sensitive(true);
00177       }
00178 
00179       MD5 md5;
00180       bool selection_is_valid=false;
00181       for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator hist_iter=histogram_collection_names.begin();
00182            hist_iter!=histogram_collection_names.end(); 
00183            hist_iter++) {
00184         md5.update(reinterpret_cast<const unsigned char*>(hist_iter->c_str()), hist_iter->size() );
00185         if (!selection_is_valid && current_hist_collection_selection == Glib::ustring(*hist_iter)) {
00186           selection_is_valid=true;
00187         }
00188       }
00189       md5.finalize();
00190       std::string hex_digest=md5.hex_digest();
00191       if (hex_digest!=_histListMD5) {
00192 
00193         std::list<Glib::ustring> listStrings;
00194         for (std::vector<std::string>::const_iterator hist_iter=histogram_collection_names.begin();
00195              hist_iter!=histogram_collection_names.end(); 
00196              hist_iter++) {
00197           std::string::size_type pos=hist_iter->find("::");
00198           if (pos!=std::string::npos) {
00199             listStrings.push_back( std::string(*hist_iter,pos+2,hist_iter->size()-pos-2+1));
00200           }
00201           else {
00202             listStrings.push_back( *hist_iter);
00203           }
00204         }
00205       
00206         _histogramCollectionSelector.set_popdown_strings(listStrings);
00207         _histogramCollectionSelector.set_value_in_list();
00208         
00209         _histListMD5=hex_digest;
00210       }
00211       
00212       if (!selection_is_valid) {
00213         Key_t group_key(group_name_and_type.first);
00214         if (hasCurrent(group_key,group_name_and_type.second)) {
00215           Key_t last_selection=currentHistogramCollection(group_key, group_name_and_type.second);
00216           _histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->set_text(last_selection.name());
00217         }
00218         else if (!_histogramCollectionSelector.get_popdown_strings().empty()) {
00219           setCurrentHistogramCollection(group_key, group_name_and_type.second, Key_t(*(_histogramCollectionSelector.get_popdown_strings().begin())));
00220           _histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->set_text(*(_histogramCollectionSelector.get_popdown_strings().begin()));
00221         }
00222         else {
00223           _histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->set_text("");
00224 
00225         }
00226 
00227       }
00228     }
00229   }
00230 }
00231 
00232 void HistogramDisplay::onHistogramGroupChanged()
00233 {
00234   setHistogramCollectionNames();
00235 }
00236 
00237 void HistogramDisplay::onHistogramCollectionChanged()
00238 {
00239 
00240   Glib::ustring current_group_selection=_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00241   if (current_group_selection.empty()) return;
00242 
00243   Glib::ustring current_hist_collection_selection=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00244   if (current_hist_collection_selection.empty()) return;
00245 
00246   std::pair<std::string,HistMgr::ECollectionType> group_name_and_type=HistMgr::getGroupNameAndCollectionType(current_group_selection);
00247   if (group_name_and_type.second >= HistMgr::kNTypes) return;
00248 
00249   if (!current_hist_collection_selection.empty()) {
00250     HistMgrPtr histograms(HistMgr::getInstance());
00251     if (!histograms) return;
00252     
00253 
00254     try {
00255       histmgr::Key_t group_key(group_name_and_type.first);
00256       histmgr::Key_t hist_key(_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text());
00257 
00258       setCurrentHistogramCollection(group_key,group_name_and_type.second,hist_key);
00259 
00260       bool is_2d=false;
00261       unsigned n_major=0;
00262       if (group_name_and_type.second != _lastCollectionType) {
00263         // when the histogramm ing mode is changed all the plots are deleted and rdone.
00264         _graphList.hide_all();
00265         while (!_graphList.get_children().empty()) {
00266           _graphList.remove(**(_graphList.get_children().begin()));
00267         }
00268       }
00269       _lastCollectionType=group_name_and_type.second;
00270       switch (group_name_and_type.second) {
00271       case HistMgr::kH1: {
00272         const HistogramCollection_t &hist_col=histograms->getHistogramCollection(Key_t(group_key.name()), Key_t(hist_key.name()));
00273         if ((is_2d=hist_col.is2D() )) {
00274           n_major=hist_col.nMajor();
00275         }
00276 
00277         break;
00278       }
00279       case HistMgr::kH2: {
00280         const Histogram2DCollection_t &hist_col=histograms->getHistogram2DCollection(Key_t(group_key.name()), Key_t(hist_key.name()));
00281         if ((is_2d=hist_col.is2D())) {
00282             n_major=hist_col.nMajor();
00283           }
00284 
00285         break;
00286       }
00287       case HistMgr::kGraph: {
00288         const GraphCollection_t &hist_col=histograms->getGraphCollection(Key_t(group_key.name()), Key_t(hist_key.name()));
00289         if (( is_2d=hist_col.is2D() )) {
00290             n_major=hist_col.nMajor();
00291         }
00292 
00293         break;
00294       }
00295       case HistMgr::kProfile: {
00296         const ProfileCollection_t &hist_col=histograms->getProfileCollection(Key_t(group_key.name()), Key_t(hist_key.name()));
00297         if (( is_2d=hist_col.is2D() )) {
00298           n_major=hist_col.nMajor();
00299         }
00300         break;
00301       }
00302       default:
00303         break;
00304       }
00305 
00306       if (is_2d) {
00307         _firstIndexSelector.set_sensitive(true);
00308         _firstIndexSelector.get_adjustment()->set_upper(n_major);
00309 
00310         HistPar_t &hist_par=getHistPar(group_key,group_name_and_type.second,hist_key);
00311 
00312         _rebinSelector.set_value(hist_par.rebin());
00313         _logY.set_active(hist_par.logY());
00314         if (hist_par.firstIndex() >= n_major && n_major>0) {
00315           hist_par.setFirstIndex(n_major-1);
00316         }
00317         if ( hist_par.firstIndex() != static_cast<UInt_t>(_firstIndexSelector.get_value_as_int())) {
00318           _firstIndexSelector.set_value(hist_par.firstIndex());
00319         }
00320         else {
00321           updateHistogramDisplay();
00322         }
00323       }
00324       else {
00325         _firstIndexSelector.set_sensitive(false);
00326         updateHistogramDisplay();
00327       }
00328     }
00329     catch (std::logic_error &err) {
00330       // this should never happen but if ii happens it is not a desaster for the GUI 
00331       // so it is just ignored.
00332     }
00333   }
00334 }
00335 
00336 void HistogramDisplay::onFirstIndexChanged()
00337 {
00338   updateHistogramDisplay();
00339 }
00340 
00341 void HistogramDisplay::onRebinChanged()
00342 {
00343   Glib::ustring current_hist_collection_selection=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00344 
00345   if (!current_hist_collection_selection.empty()) {
00346 
00347     std::pair<std::string,HistMgr::ECollectionType> group_name_and_type=HistMgr::getGroupNameAndCollectionType(_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text());
00348     if (group_name_and_type.second >= HistMgr::kNTypes) return;
00349 
00350     histmgr::Key_t group_key(group_name_and_type.first );
00351     histmgr::Key_t hist_key(current_hist_collection_selection);
00352 
00353     HistPar_t &hist_par=getHistPar(group_key,group_name_and_type.second, hist_key);
00354 
00355     hist_par.resetRange();
00356     updateHistogramDisplay();
00357   }
00358 }
00359 
00360 void HistogramDisplay::onLogYChanged()
00361 {
00362   Glib::ustring current_hist_collection_selection=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00363   if (!current_hist_collection_selection.empty()) {
00364     HistMgrPtr histograms(HistMgr::getInstance());
00365     if (!histograms) return;
00366     
00367     try {
00368       std::pair<std::string,HistMgr::ECollectionType> group_name_and_type=HistMgr::getGroupNameAndCollectionType(_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text());
00369       if (group_name_and_type.second >= HistMgr::kNTypes) return;
00370       
00371       histmgr::Key_t group_key(group_name_and_type.first );
00372       histmgr::Key_t hist_key(current_hist_collection_selection);
00373       
00374       HistPar_t &hist_par=getHistPar(group_key,group_name_and_type.second, hist_key);
00375 
00376       hist_par.setLogY(_logY.get_active());
00377       std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > graphs( _graphList.get_children());
00378 
00379       Double_t miny=(_logY.get_active() ? std::max(0.9,hist_par.min()) : hist_par.min());
00380       Double_t maxy=hist_par.max();
00381 
00382       for (std::vector<Gtk::Widget *>::iterator graph_iter=graphs.begin();
00383            graph_iter!=graphs.end();
00384            graph_iter++) {
00385         
00386         GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(*graph_iter);
00387         assert ( a_graph );
00388 
00389         if (miny<maxy) {
00390           a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_LEFT)->set_range(miny,maxy,_logY.get_active());
00391           a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_RIGHT)->set_range(miny,maxy,_logY.get_active());
00392           a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_LEFT)->set_autoscale(false);
00393           a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_RIGHT)->set_autoscale(false);
00394         }
00395         a_graph->replot();
00396       }
00397     }
00398     catch (std::logic_error &err) {
00399       // this should never happen but if ii happens it is not a desaster for the GUI 
00400       // so it is just ignored.
00401     }
00402   }
00403 }
00404 
00405 void HistogramDisplay::updateHistogramDisplay()
00406 {
00407   Glib::ustring current_hist_collection_selection=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00408 
00409   Glib::ustring current_group_selection=_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00410 
00411   if (!current_hist_collection_selection.empty()) {
00412 
00413     std::pair<std::string,HistMgr::ECollectionType> group_name_and_type=HistMgr::getGroupNameAndCollectionType(_histogramGroupSelector.get_entry()->get_text());
00414     if (group_name_and_type.second >= HistMgr::kNTypes) return;
00415     
00416     histmgr::Key_t group_key(group_name_and_type.first );
00417     histmgr::Key_t hist_key(current_hist_collection_selection);
00418     setCurrentHistogramCollection(group_key,group_name_and_type.second,hist_key);
00419     switch (group_name_and_type.second) {
00420       //  HistPar_t &hist_par=getHistPar(group_key,group_name_and_type.second, hist_key);
00421     case HistMgr::kH1: {
00422       showHistogramCollection(group_key, group_name_and_type.second, hist_key);
00423       break;
00424     }
00425     case HistMgr::kH2: {
00426       showHistogram2DCollection(group_key, group_name_and_type.second, hist_key);
00427       break;
00428     }
00429     case HistMgr::kGraph: {
00430       break;
00431       }
00432     case HistMgr::kProfile: {
00433       break;
00434       }
00435     default:
00436       break;
00437     }
00438 
00439     
00440   }
00441 }
00442 
00443 void HistogramDisplay::showHistogramCollection(const histmgr::Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type, const histmgr::Key_t &hist_key)
00444 {
00445   if (type != HistMgr::kH1) return;
00446     HistMgrPtr histograms(HistMgr::getInstance());
00447     if (!histograms) return;
00448 
00449     try {
00450       // there are two keys: one to access the parameters for of the histogram display, and one to access the histogram
00451       const HistogramCollection_t &hist_col=histograms->getHistogramCollection(Key_t(group_key.name()),Key_t(hist_key.name()));
00452 
00453       HistPar_t &hist_par=getHistPar(group_key,type,hist_key);
00454 
00455       bool need_to_create_graphs=false;
00456       for (std::vector< Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve> >::const_iterator curve_iter=_curveList.begin();
00457            curve_iter!=_curveList.end();
00458            curve_iter++) {
00459         if (!dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Curve *>(((*curve_iter).operator->())) || dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(((*curve_iter).operator->()))) {
00460           need_to_create_graphs=true;
00461         }
00462       }
00463 
00464       UInt_t a_rebin=static_cast<UInt_t>(_rebinSelector.get_value_as_int());
00465       hist_par.setRebin(a_rebin);
00466 
00467       if (hist_col.is2D()) {
00468         UInt_t current_index=static_cast<UInt_t>(_firstIndexSelector.get_value_as_int());
00469         if (current_index<hist_col.nMajor()) {
00470           //      Glib::ustring histogram_name=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00471           if (!hist_key.name().empty()) {
00472             hist_par.setFirstIndex(current_index);
00473           }
00474 
00475           UInt_t n_histograms=hist_col.nMinor(current_index);
00476           if (need_to_create_graphs || n_histograms!=_graphList.get_children().size()) {
00477             Float_t xmin=0;
00478             Float_t xmax=0;
00479             if (hist_col.n()>0) {
00480               const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(0);
00481               xmin=a_hist->xMin();
00482               xmax=a_hist->xMax();
00483             }
00484             createHistogramGraphs(hist_key.name(),Glib::ustring(""),n_histograms,xmin,xmax,hist_par);
00485           }
00486 
00487           std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > graphs( _graphList.get_children());
00488           assert ( graphs.size() == n_histograms );
00489           
00490           for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_histograms; hist_i++) {
00491             std::stringstream full_title;
00492             full_title << hist_key.name() << hist_col.getName(current_index) << " (index " << hist_i << ")";  
00493             GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(graphs[hist_i]);
00494             assert ( a_graph );
00495             a_graph->title()->set_text(full_title.str());
00496 
00497             const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(current_index, hist_i);
00498             setGraph(graphs, hist_i, hist_key.name() , a_hist,hist_par);
00499           }
00500         }
00501         else if (hist_col.nMajor()>0) {
00502           _firstIndexSelector.set_value(hist_col.nMajor()-1);
00503         }
00504       }
00505       else {
00506         UInt_t n_histograms=hist_col.n();
00507         if (need_to_create_graphs || n_histograms!=_graphList.get_children().size()) {
00508           Float_t xmin=0;
00509           Float_t xmax=0;
00510           if (n_histograms>0) {
00511             const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(0);
00512             xmin=a_hist->xMin();
00513             xmax=a_hist->xMax();
00514           }
00515           createHistogramGraphs(hist_key.name(),"",n_histograms,xmin,xmax, hist_par);
00516         }
00517         std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > graphs( _graphList.get_children());
00518         assert ( graphs.size() == n_histograms );
00519         
00520         for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_histograms; hist_i++) {
00521           std::stringstream full_title;
00522           full_title << hist_key.name() << " " << hist_col.getName(hist_i) << " (index " << hist_i << ")";  
00523           GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(graphs[hist_i]);
00524           assert ( a_graph );
00525           a_graph->title()->set_text(full_title.str());
00526 
00527           const FloatHistogram1D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(hist_i);
00528           setGraph(graphs, hist_i, hist_key.name() , a_hist,hist_par);
00529         }
00530 
00531       }
00532       replotGraphs(hist_par);
00533     }
00534     catch (std::logic_error &err) {
00535       // this should never happen but if ii happens it is not a desaster for the GUI 
00536       // so it is just ignored.
00537     }
00538 }
00539 
00540 void HistogramDisplay::showHistogram2DCollection(const Key_t &group_key, HistMgr::ECollectionType type, const Key_t &hist_key)
00541 {
00542   if (type != HistMgr::kH2) return;
00543 
00544     HistMgrPtr histograms(HistMgr::getInstance());
00545     if (!histograms) return;
00546 
00547     try {
00548       // there are two keys: one to access the parameters for of the histogram display, and one to access the histogram
00549       const Histogram2DCollection_t &hist_col=histograms->getHistogram2DCollection(Key_t(group_key.name()),Key_t(hist_key.name()));
00550       HistPar_t &hist_par=getHistPar(group_key,type,hist_key);
00551       UInt_t a_rebin=static_cast<UInt_t>(_rebinSelector.get_value_as_int());
00552       hist_par.setRebin(a_rebin);
00553 
00554       bool need_to_create_graphs=false;
00555       for (std::vector< Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve> >::const_iterator curve_iter=_curveList.begin();
00556            curve_iter!=_curveList.end();
00557            curve_iter++) {
00558         if (!dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Curve *>(((*curve_iter).operator->())) || !dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(((*curve_iter).operator->()))) {
00559           need_to_create_graphs=true;
00560         }
00561       }
00562 
00563       if (hist_col.is2D()) {
00564         UInt_t current_index=static_cast<UInt_t>(_firstIndexSelector.get_value_as_int());
00565         if (current_index<hist_col.nMajor()) {
00566           Glib::ustring histogram_name=_histogramCollectionSelector.get_entry()->get_text();
00567           if (!histogram_name.empty()) {
00568             hist_par.setFirstIndex(current_index);
00569           }
00570 
00571           UInt_t n_histograms=hist_col.nMinor(current_index);
00572           if ( need_to_create_graphs || n_histograms!=_graphList.get_children().size()) {
00573             Float_t xmin=0;
00574             Float_t xmax=0;
00575             if (hist_col.n()>0) {
00576               const FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(0);
00577               xmin=a_hist->xMin();
00578               xmax=a_hist->xMax();
00579             }
00580             createHistogramGraphs(hist_key.name(),Glib::ustring(""),n_histograms,xmin,xmax,hist_par);
00581           }
00582 
00583           std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > graphs( _graphList.get_children());
00584           assert ( graphs.size() == n_histograms );
00585           
00586           for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_histograms; hist_i++) {
00587             std::stringstream full_title;
00588             full_title << hist_key.name() << hist_col.getName(current_index) << " (index " << hist_i << ")";  
00589             GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(graphs[hist_i]);
00590             assert ( a_graph );
00591             a_graph->title()->set_text(full_title.str());
00592 
00593             const FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(current_index, hist_i);
00594             setGraph(graphs, hist_i, hist_key.name() , a_hist,hist_par);
00595           }
00596         }
00597         else if (hist_col.nMajor()>0) {
00598           _firstIndexSelector.set_value(hist_col.nMajor()-1);
00599         }
00600       }
00601       else {
00602         UInt_t n_histograms=hist_col.n();
00603         if ( need_to_create_graphs || n_histograms!=_graphList.get_children().size()) {
00604           Float_t xmin=0;
00605           Float_t xmax=0;
00606           if (n_histograms>0) {
00607             const FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(0);
00608             xmin=a_hist->xMin();
00609             xmax=a_hist->xMax();
00610           }
00611           createHistogramGraphs(hist_key.name(),"",n_histograms,xmin,xmax, hist_par);
00612         }
00613         std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > graphs( _graphList.get_children());
00614         assert ( graphs.size() == n_histograms );
00615         
00616         for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i<n_histograms; hist_i++) {
00617           std::stringstream full_title;
00618           full_title << hist_key.name() << " " << hist_col.getName(hist_i) << " (index " << hist_i << ")";  
00619           GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(graphs[hist_i]);
00620           assert ( a_graph );
00621           a_graph->title()->set_text(full_title.str());
00622 
00623           const FloatHistogram2D *a_hist=hist_col.histogram(hist_i);
00624           setGraph(graphs, hist_i, hist_key.name() , a_hist,hist_par);
00625         }
00626 
00627       }
00628       replotGraphs(hist_par);
00629     }
00630     catch (std::logic_error &err) {
00631       // this should never happen but if ii happens it is not a desaster for the GUI 
00632       // so it is just ignored.
00633     }
00634 }
00635 
00636 
00637 void HistogramDisplay::createHistogramGraphs(const Glib::ustring &title, const Glib::ustring &x_axis_title, 
00638                                              UInt_t n_hist, const Float_t &x_min, const Float_t &x_max, 
00639                                              const HistPar_t &hist_par)
00640 {
00641   _graphList.hide_all();
00642   while (!_graphList.get_children().empty()) {
00643     _graphList.remove(**(_graphList.get_children().begin()));
00644   }
00645   _curveList.clear();
00646   _underflowCurveList.clear();
00647   _overflowCurveList.clear();
00648 
00649   Double_t miny=(hist_par.logY() ? std::max(0.9,hist_par.min()) : hist_par.min());
00650   Double_t maxy=hist_par.max();
00651 
00652   for (UInt_t hist_i=0; hist_i < n_hist; hist_i++) {
00653     std::stringstream full_title;
00654     full_title << title << " (index " << hist_i << ")";  
00655     
00656     GraphDisplay *a_graph=Gtk::manage(new GraphDisplay(Glib::ustring(full_title.str()),
00657                                                        x_axis_title,
00658                                                        Glib::ustring("entries"),
00659                                                        x_min,x_max,0.,0.));
00660     a_graph->set_size_request(-1,150);
00661 
00662     if (miny<maxy) {
00663       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_LEFT)->set_range(miny,maxy,hist_par.logY());
00664       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_RIGHT)->set_range(miny,maxy,hist_par.logY());
00665       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_LEFT)->set_autoscale(false);
00666       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_RIGHT)->set_autoscale(false);
00667     }
00668     
00669     _graphList.add(*a_graph);
00670   }
00671 
00672   _graphList.show_all();
00673 }
00674 
00675 void HistogramDisplay::setGraph(std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > &graphs, UInt_t hist_i, 
00676                                 const Glib::ustring &title, const FloatHistogram1D * const a_hist, 
00677                                 HistPar_t &hist_par)
00678 {
00679 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00680   assert( a_hist);
00681   assert( graphs.size() > hist_i);
00682 #endif
00683 
00684   GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(graphs[hist_i]);
00685   assert ( a_graph );
00686 
00687   if (hist_i >= _curveList.size()) {
00688     std::stringstream full_title;
00689     full_title << title;
00690     _curveList.resize(hist_i);
00691     _curveList.push_back(Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve>(new PlotMM::Curve(full_title.str())));
00692     _curveList.back()->set_curve_style(PlotMM::CURVE_LINES);
00693     _curveList.back()->paint()->set_pen_color(Gdk::Color("black"));
00694     _curveList.back()->symbol()->set_style(PlotMM::SYMBOL_NONE);
00695     a_graph->add_curve(_curveList.back());
00696   }
00697   //  else if (!dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Curve *>(((_curveList[hist_i]).operator->())) || dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(((_curveList[hist_i]).operator->()))) {
00698     //    _curveList[hist_i]=Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve>(new PlotMM::Curve(title));
00699     //  }
00700 
00701   if (hist_i >= _underflowCurveList.size()) {
00702     std::stringstream full_title;
00703     full_title << "underflow_" << title;
00704     _underflowCurveList.resize(hist_i);
00705     _underflowCurveList.push_back(Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve>(new PlotMM::Curve(full_title.str())));
00706     _underflowCurveList.back()->set_curve_style(PlotMM::CURVE_LINES);
00707     Gdk::Color red("red");
00708     _underflowCurveList.back()->paint()->set_pen_color(red);
00709     _underflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->set_style(PlotMM::SYMBOL_ELLIPSE);
00710     _underflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->set_size(10);
00711     _underflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->paint()->set_pen_color(red);
00712     _underflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->paint()->set_brush_color(red);
00713     a_graph->add_curve(_underflowCurveList.back());
00714   }
00715 
00716   if (hist_i >= _overflowCurveList.size()) {
00717     std::stringstream full_title;
00718     full_title << "overflow_" << title;
00719     _overflowCurveList.resize(hist_i);
00720     _overflowCurveList.push_back(Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve>(new PlotMM::Curve(full_title.str())));
00721     _overflowCurveList.back()->set_curve_style(PlotMM::CURVE_LINES);
00722     Gdk::Color red("red");
00723     _overflowCurveList.back()->paint()->set_pen_color(red);
00724     _overflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->set_style(PlotMM::SYMBOL_ELLIPSE);
00725     _overflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->set_size(10);
00726     _overflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->paint()->set_pen_color(red);
00727     _overflowCurveList.back()->symbol()->paint()->set_brush_color(red);
00728     a_graph->add_curve(_overflowCurveList.back());
00729   }
00730 
00731   std::vector<Double_t> x_arr;
00732   std::vector<Double_t> y_arr;
00733   
00734   UInt_t combine_n_bins=hist_par.rebin();
00735   if (combine_n_bins>1) {
00736     UInt_t n_bins=(a_hist->nBins()+combine_n_bins-1)/combine_n_bins;
00737     if (n_bins>200) {
00738       for (UInt_t main_bin_i=a_hist->firstBinIndex(); main_bin_i<=a_hist->lastBinIndex(); main_bin_i+=combine_n_bins) {
00739         Double_t sum_y=0;
00740         Double_t sum_x=0;
00741         for (UInt_t bin_i=main_bin_i; bin_i < main_bin_i+combine_n_bins; bin_i++) {
00742         sum_x+=a_hist->binCenter(bin_i);
00743         sum_y+=a_hist->binContent(bin_i);
00744         }
00745         x_arr.push_back(sum_x/combine_n_bins);
00746         y_arr.push_back(sum_y);
00747         hist_par.setValue(sum_y);
00748       }
00749     }
00750     else {
00751       for (UInt_t main_bin_i=a_hist->firstBinIndex(); main_bin_i<=a_hist->lastBinIndex(); main_bin_i+=combine_n_bins) {
00752         Double_t sum_y=0;
00753         Double_t sum_bin_width=0;
00754         for (UInt_t bin_i=main_bin_i; bin_i < main_bin_i+combine_n_bins; bin_i++) {
00755           sum_y+=a_hist->binContent(bin_i);
00756           sum_bin_width+=a_hist->binWidth(bin_i);
00757         }
00758         x_arr.push_back(a_hist->binLowEdge(main_bin_i));
00759         x_arr.push_back(x_arr.back()+sum_bin_width);
00760         y_arr.push_back(sum_y);
00761         y_arr.push_back(sum_y);
00762         hist_par.setValue(sum_y);
00763       }
00764     }
00765   }
00766   else {
00767     if (a_hist->nBins()>200) {
00768       for (UInt_t bin_i=a_hist->firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=a_hist->lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00769         x_arr.push_back(a_hist->binCenter(bin_i));
00770         y_arr.push_back(a_hist->binContent(bin_i));
00771         hist_par.setValue(y_arr.back());
00772       }
00773     }
00774     else {
00775       for (UInt_t bin_i=a_hist->firstBinIndex(); bin_i<=a_hist->lastBinIndex(); bin_i++) {
00776         x_arr.push_back(a_hist->binLowEdge(bin_i));
00777         x_arr.push_back(x_arr.back()+a_hist->binWidth(bin_i));
00778         y_arr.push_back(a_hist->binContent(bin_i));
00779         y_arr.push_back(y_arr.back());
00780         hist_par.setValue(y_arr.back());
00781       }
00782     }
00783   }
00784   _curveList[hist_i]->set_data(x_arr,y_arr);
00785   
00786   Double_t x_val[2];
00787   Double_t y_val[2];
00788   x_val[0]=a_hist->binCenter(a_hist->firstBinIndex());
00789   x_val[1]=a_hist->binCenter(a_hist->firstBinIndex());
00790   y_val[0]=0.;
00791   y_val[1]=a_hist->underflow();
00792   _underflowCurveList[hist_i]->set_data(x_val,y_val,2);
00793   hist_par.setValue(y_val[1]);
00794 
00795   x_val[0]=a_hist->binCenter(a_hist->lastBinIndex());
00796   x_val[1]=a_hist->binCenter(a_hist->lastBinIndex());
00797   y_val[0]=0.;
00798   y_val[1]=a_hist->overflow();
00799   _overflowCurveList[hist_i]->set_data(x_val,y_val,2);
00800   hist_par.setValue(y_val[1]);
00801 }
00802 
00803 void HistogramDisplay::setGraph(std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > &graphs, UInt_t hist_i, 
00804                                 const Glib::ustring &title, const FloatHistogram2D * const a_hist, 
00805                                 HistPar_t &hist_par)
00806 {
00807 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00808   assert( a_hist);
00809   assert( graphs.size() > hist_i);
00810 #endif
00811 
00812   GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(graphs[hist_i]);
00813   assert ( a_graph );
00814         
00815   if (hist_i >= _curveList.size()) {
00816     _curveList.resize(hist_i);
00817     _curveList.push_back(Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve>(new PlotMM::Histogram2D(title)));
00818     _curveList.back()->set_curve_style(PlotMM::CURVE_LINES);
00819     _curveList.back()->paint()->set_pen_color(Gdk::Color("black"));
00820     _curveList.back()->symbol()->set_style(PlotMM::SYMBOL_NONE);
00821     a_graph->add_curve(_curveList.back());
00822   }
00823   //else {
00824   //  _curveList[hist_i]=Glib::RefPtr<PlotMM::Curve>(new PlotMM::Histogram2D(title));
00825   //}
00826 
00827   std::vector<Double_t> x_arr;
00828   std::vector<Double_t> y_arr;
00829   
00830   UInt_t combine_n_bins=hist_par.rebin();
00831   if (combine_n_bins>1) {
00832     std::vector<Float_t> temp_arr;
00833     UInt_t y_bin_offset=(a_hist->xNBins()/combine_n_bins);
00834     if (y_bin_offset<=1) {
00835       y_bin_offset++;
00836     }
00837     y_bin_offset+=2; //overflow
00838 
00839     unsigned int n_bins_y=a_hist->yNBins()/combine_n_bins;
00840     if (n_bins_y<=1) {
00841       n_bins_y++;
00842     }
00843     n_bins_y+=2; //overflow
00844 
00845     temp_arr.resize( y_bin_offset * n_bins_y );
00846 
00847     unsigned int dest_bin_y_i = y_bin_offset;
00848     for (UInt_t y_i=a_hist->yFirstBinIndex(); y_i<=a_hist->yLastBinIndex();y_i+=combine_n_bins) {
00849       unsigned int dest_bin_i=dest_bin_y_i + 1; // overflow
00850       for (UInt_t x_i=a_hist->xFirstBinIndex(); x_i<=a_hist->xLastBinIndex();x_i+=combine_n_bins) {
00851         
00852         unsigned int last_bin_y_i = ( y_i + combine_n_bins < a_hist->yLastBinIndex() ? y_i + combine_n_bins : a_hist->yLastBinIndex());
00853         unsigned int last_bin_x_i = ( x_i + combine_n_bins < a_hist->xLastBinIndex() ? x_i + combine_n_bins : a_hist->xLastBinIndex());
00854  
00855         double bin_content=0;
00856         for (UInt_t y_ii=y_i; y_ii<last_bin_y_i; y_ii++) {
00857           for (UInt_t x_ii=y_i; x_ii<last_bin_x_i; x_ii++) {
00858             bin_content += a_hist->binContent(a_hist->binIndex(x_ii,y_ii));
00859           }
00860         }
00861 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00862         assert(dest_bin_i<temp_arr.size());;
00863 #endif
00864         temp_arr[dest_bin_i]=bin_content;
00865         dest_bin_i++;
00866       }
00867       dest_bin_y_i += y_bin_offset;
00868     }
00869 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00870     assert ( dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(_curveList[hist_i].operator->()) != NULL );
00871 #endif
00872     dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(_curveList[hist_i].operator->())->set_data(PlotMM::Binning(y_bin_offset-2,a_hist->xMin(),a_hist->xMax()),
00873                                  PlotMM::Binning(n_bins_y-2,a_hist->yMin(),a_hist->yMax()), &temp_arr[0] );
00874   }
00875   else {
00876     std::vector<Float_t> temp_arr;
00877     UInt_t y_bin_offset=a_hist->xNBins()+2;
00878 
00879     temp_arr.resize( y_bin_offset * (a_hist->yNBins() + 2) );
00880 
00881     unsigned int dest_bin_y_i=y_bin_offset;
00882     for (UInt_t y_i=a_hist->yFirstBinIndex(); y_i<=a_hist->yLastBinIndex();y_i++) {
00883       unsigned int dest_bin_i=dest_bin_y_i + 1; // overflow
00884       for (UInt_t x_i=a_hist->xFirstBinIndex(); x_i<=a_hist->xLastBinIndex();x_i++) {
00885 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00886         assert(dest_bin_i<temp_arr.size());;
00887 #endif
00888         temp_arr[dest_bin_i]=a_hist->binContent(a_hist->binIndex(x_i,y_i));
00889         dest_bin_i++;
00890       }
00891       dest_bin_y_i += y_bin_offset;
00892     }
00893 #ifdef BOUNDARY_CHECK
00894     assert ( dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(_curveList[hist_i].operator->()) != NULL );
00895 #endif
00896     dynamic_cast<PlotMM::Histogram2D *>(_curveList[hist_i].operator->())->set_data(PlotMM::Binning(a_hist->xNBins(),a_hist->xMin(),a_hist->xMax()),
00897                                  PlotMM::Binning(a_hist->yNBins(),a_hist->yMin(),a_hist->yMax()), &temp_arr[0] );
00898   }
00899 }
00900 
00901 void HistogramDisplay::replotGraphs(const HistPar_t &hist_par)
00902 {
00903   std::vector< Gtk::Widget * > graphs( _graphList.get_children());
00904   
00905   Double_t miny=(_logY.get_active() ? std::max(0.9,hist_par.min()) : hist_par.min());
00906   Double_t maxy=hist_par.max();
00907   
00908   for (std::vector<Gtk::Widget *>::iterator graph_iter=graphs.begin();
00909        graph_iter!=graphs.end();
00910        graph_iter++) {
00911     
00912     GraphDisplay *a_graph=dynamic_cast<GraphDisplay *>(*graph_iter);
00913     assert ( a_graph );
00914     
00915     if (miny<maxy) {
00916       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_LEFT)->set_range(miny,maxy,_logY.get_active());
00917       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_RIGHT)->set_range(miny,maxy,_logY.get_active());
00918       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_LEFT)->set_autoscale(false);
00919       a_graph->scale(PlotMM::AXIS_RIGHT)->set_autoscale(false);
00920     }
00921     a_graph->replot();
00922   }
00923 }
00924 
00925 void HistogramDisplay::onEventChanged()
00926 {
00927   setGroupNames();
00928   updateHistogramDisplay();
00929 }
00930 
00931 
00932 }
